item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus
item.description: "When I have a little money, I buy books; and if I have any left, I buy food and clothes." -- Desiderius Erasmus Roterodamus

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "Maybe we're all like that with our mothers. They seem ordinary until one day they're extraordinary." -- Lisa See

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "When someone you love dies, and you're not expecting it, you don't lose her all at once; you lose her in pieces over a long time—the way the mail stops coming, and her scent fades from the pillows and even from the clothes in her closet and drawers. Gradually, you accumulate the parts of her that are gone. Just when the day comes—when there's a particular missing part that overwhelms you with the feeling that she's gone, forever—there comes another day, and another specifically missing part." -- John Irving

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl
